extendedInfo.description: Flash SeatsÂ® Mobile App: The Future of Ticketing Todayâ¢The Flash SeatsÂ® Mobile App makes it easier for you to discover, buy, sell and transfer your tickets on-the-go. You can even enter your events with a Mobile ID through the app on your phone! Simplify your ticket experience with Flash SeatsÂ® mobile!   - Enter events with convenience: The ONLY mobile ticketing application that lets you enter events and buy, sell, or transfer tickets, all from your phone. The Flash Seats Mobile App provides you with a secure, unique, 2D barcode that is scanned to get you into events. No tickets to bring, no ID to rememberâjust show your phone and youâre in!- Discover and Buy guaranteed tickets instantly:Find your favorite artists or team nearby or in another location. Browse the listings that meet your needs, find the seats you want, pay for them, and youâre all set! Tickets you buy from Flash Seats are guaranteed and are instantly added to your account.- Transfer TicketsWant to give your tickets to a family member or friend? Itâs as simple as selecting the tickets you would like to transfer and entering the recipientâs email address. Change your mind later? You can retract the transfer if your recipient hasn't accepted it.- Sell TicketsCan't make it to an event? List your tickets for sale using the mobile app. In as few as 2 taps, your tickets are available for viewing by thousands of others looking to buy. Retract your listing at any time, and the tickets are ready for you to attend the event.

reviews.title: Needs team search like online has
reviews.comment: Needs a search function to search by sports teams. Nothing is showing up for nuggets but I know season ticket holders are selling seats for games they wont attend. Only shows the few events coming up soon so I cant search to buy for the future games I want
reviews.author: Kyle Daniels

reviews.title: Bidding??
reviews.comment: The scanning feature is cool but still need to add the bidding feature to the app.
reviews.author: Dustin Evans

reviews.title: Go Real Salt Lake!
reviews.comment: Good idea, works well..., hope vendors have the right equipment
reviews.author: Patrick Funk
